Message.Title: Is the .20 savings from refinancing in analysts.54 estimate for 2013?
Message.Msg: I don't see how they could be sure it would happen

Message.Title: Who are they trying to kid?
Message.Msg: When you murder someone, that is evil. To orphan your own child, or any child, is evil. This is not some multiple choice test in the LCD government schools. There is no ambiguity. Belcher committed a great evil. What about the child?
